activities: Criteo engages in display advertising personalized based on user’s interests. Criteo partners with advertisers (primarily online retailers) by tagging visitors of the advertisers websites with an anonymous browser cookie. Criteo does not collect data from multiple web domains operated by different parties to categorize likely consumer interest segments. The browser cookie tracks the products viewed by the visitor and pages visited of the individual advertiser for whom Criteo is delivering ads. It does not collect personally identifiable information of the visitor nor store the IP addresses of visitors for OBA purposes. OBA data is stored partially in cookies and partially server side. Cookies containing OBA data have a 13 months lifespan. OBA data stored on the server side is limited to 13 months.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online data data collected directly on internet / human resources data related to the employees of Criteo
